Structs/ClassBasedOnClickListener.html#/.name: schemeName
Structs/ClassBasedOnClickListener.html#/.abstract: The name of the URL scheme which should be used. Note: Make sure that the given String is a valid as scheme name.

Structs/ClassBasedOnClickListener.html#/.name: querySelector
Structs/ClassBasedOnClickListener.html#/.abstract: The query selector for the elements which the listener should be added to. See https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Document/querySelector for further information about query selectors.

Structs/ClassBasedOnClickListener.html#/.name: attributeName
Structs/ClassBasedOnClickListener.html#/.abstract: The name of the attribute whose content should be passed to the onClickAction action.

Structs/ClassBasedOnClickListener.html#/.name: selectAll
Structs/ClassBasedOnClickListener.html#/.abstract: Whether the listener should be added to all found elements or only to the first one. See https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Element/querySelectorAll for further information. The default value is true.

Structs/ClassBasedOnClickListener.html#/.name: onClickAction
Structs/ClassBasedOnClickListener.html#/.abstract: The closure which will be called if the specified class was clicked. attributeContent contains the string content of the specified attribute and touchPointRelativeToWebView reprsents the touch point relative to the web view.

Structs/ClassBasedOnClickListener.html#/.name: init(schemeName:querySelector:attributeName:selectAll:onClickAction:)
Structs/ClassBasedOnClickListener.html#/.abstract: Initializes a ClassBasedOnClickListener instance. Append it to the classBasedOnClickListeners property from the FolioReaderConfig to receive on click events. The default selectAll value is true.

Structs/MediaType.html.name: MediaType
Structs/MediaType.html.abstract: MediaType is used to tell the type of content a resource is.

Structs/ClassBasedOnClickListener.html.name: ClassBasedOnClickListener
Structs/ClassBasedOnClickListener.html.abstract: A ClassBasedOnClickListener takes a closure which is performed if a given html class is clicked. The closure will reveice the content of the specified parameter.

Structs/QuoteImage.html.name: QuoteImage
Structs/QuoteImage.html.abstract: Defines a custom Quote image, can be a square UIImage, solid UIColor or CAGradientLayer.

Protocols/FolioReaderPageDelegate.html#/.name: pageWillLoad(_:)
Protocols/FolioReaderPageDelegate.html#/.abstract: Notify that the page will be loaded. Note: The webview content itself is already loaded at this moment. But some java script operations like the adding of class based on click listeners will happen right after this method. If you want to perform custom java script before this happens this method is the right choice. If you want to modify the html content (and not run java script) you have to use htmlContentForPage() from the FolioReaderCenterDelegate.

Protocols/FolioReaderPageDelegate.html#/.name: pageDidLoad(_:)
Protocols/FolioReaderPageDelegate.html#/.abstract: Notifies that page did load. A page load doesn’t mean that this page is displayed right away, use pageDidAppear to get informed about the appearance of a page.

Protocols/FolioReaderCenterDelegate.html.name: pageDidAppear(_:)
Protocols/FolioReaderCenterDelegate.html.abstract: Notifies that a page appeared. This is triggered when a page is chosen and displayed.

Protocols/FolioReaderCenterDelegate.html.name: htmlContentForPage(_:htmlContent:)
Protocols/FolioReaderCenterDelegate.html.abstract: Passes and returns the HTML content as String. Implement this method if you want to modify the HTML content of a FolioReaderPage.

Protocols/FolioReaderCenterDelegate.html.name: pageItemChanged(_:)
Protocols/FolioReaderCenterDelegate.html.abstract: Notifies that a page changed. This is triggered when collection view cell is changed.

Enums/MediaOverlayStyle.html.name: MediaOverlayStyle
Enums/MediaOverlayStyle.html.abstract: Defines the media overlay and TTS selection

Classes/Highlight.html#/s:14FolioReaderK.name: allByBookId(withConfiguration:bookId:andPage:)
Classes/Highlight.html#/s:14FolioReaderK.abstract: Return a list of Highlights with a given ID

Classes/Highlight.html#/s:14FolioReaderK.name: removeFromHTMLById(withinPage:highlightId:)
Classes/Highlight.html#/s:14FolioReaderK.abstract: Remove a Highlight from HTML by ID

Classes/Highlight.html#/s:14FolioReaderK.name: removeSentenceSpam(_:)
Classes/Highlight.html#/s:14FolioReaderK.abstract: Remove span tag before store the highlight, this span is added on JavaScript.

Classes/FolioReaderPage.html#/s:14FolioR.name: pageNumber
Classes/FolioReaderPage.html#/s:14FolioR.abstract: The index of the current page. Note: The index start at 1!

Classes/FolioReaderPage.html#/s:14FolioR.name: scrollPageToOffset(_:animated:)
Classes/FolioReaderPage.html#/s:14FolioR.abstract: Scrolls the page to a given offset

Classes/FolioReaderPage.html#/s:14FolioR.name: handleAnchor(_:avoidBeginningAnchors:animated:)
Classes/FolioReaderPage.html#/s:14FolioR.abstract: Handdle #anchors in html, get the offset and scroll to it

Classes/FolioReaderPage.html#/s:14FolioR.name: performJavaScript(_:)
Classes/FolioReaderPage.html#/s:14FolioR.abstract: Runs a JavaScript script and returns it result. The result of running the JavaScript script passed in the script parameter, or nil if the script fails.

Classes/FolioReader.html#/s:14FolioReade.name: presentReader(parentViewController:withEpubPath:unzipPath:andConfig:shouldRemoveEpub:animated:)
Classes/FolioReader.html#/s:14FolioReade.abstract: Present a Folio Reader Container modally on a Parent View Controller.

Classes/FolioReader.html#/s:14FolioReade.name: nightMode
Classes/FolioReader.html#/s:14FolioReade.abstract: Check if current theme is Night mode

Classes/FolioReader.html#/s:14FolioReade.name: currentAudioRate
Classes/FolioReader.html#/s:14FolioReade.abstract: Check current audio rate, the speed of speech voice. Default 0

Classes/FolioReader.html#/s:14FolioReade.name: currentMediaOverlayStyle
Classes/FolioReader.html#/s:14FolioReade.abstract: Check the current Media Overlay or TTS style

Classes/FolioReader.html#/c:@CM@FolioRea.name: saveReaderState()
Classes/FolioReader.html#/c:@CM@FolioRea.abstract: Save Reader state, book, page and scroll offset.

Classes/FolioReader.html#/s:14FolioReade.name: close()
Classes/FolioReader.html#/s:14FolioReade.abstract: Closes and save the reader current instance.

Classes/FolioReaderConfig.html#/s:14Foli.name: classBasedOnClickListeners
Classes/FolioReaderConfig.html#/s:14Foli.abstract: Array of ClassBasedOnClickListener objects. A ClassBasedOnClickListener takes a closure which is performed if a given html class is clicked. The closure will reveice the content of the specified parameter.

Classes/FolioReaderConfig.html#/s:14Foli.name: hideBars
Classes/FolioReaderConfig.html#/s:14Foli.abstract: hide the navigation bar and the bottom status view

Classes/FolioReaderConfig.html#/s:14Foli.name: scrollDirection
Classes/FolioReaderConfig.html#/s:14Foli.abstract: If canChangeScrollDirection is true it will be overrided by user’s option.

Classes/FolioReaderConfig.html#/s:14Foli.name: canChangeScrollDirection
Classes/FolioReaderConfig.html#/s:14Foli.abstract: Enable or disable hability to user change scroll direction on menu.

Classes/FolioReaderConfig.html#/s:14Foli.name: shouldHideNavigationOnTap
Classes/FolioReaderConfig.html#/s:14Foli.abstract: Should hide navigation bar on user tap

Classes/FolioReaderConfig.html#/s:14Foli.name: allowSharing
Classes/FolioReaderConfig.html#/s:14Foli.abstract: Allow sharing option, if false will hide all sharing icons and options

Classes/FolioReaderConfig.html#/s:14Foli.name: loadSavedPositionForCurrentBook
Classes/FolioReaderConfig.html#/s:14Foli.abstract: Go to saved position when open a book

Classes/FolioReaderConfig.html#/s:14Foli.name: quoteCustomBackgrounds
Classes/FolioReaderConfig.html#/s:14Foli.abstract: Add custom backgrounds and font colors to Quote Images

Classes/FolioReaderConfig.html#/s:14Foli.name: quotePreserveDefaultBackgrounds
Classes/FolioReaderConfig.html#/s:14Foli.abstract: Enable or disable default Quote Image backgrounds

Classes/FolioReaderConfig.html#/s:14Foli.name: useReaderMenuController
Classes/FolioReaderConfig.html#/s:14Foli.abstract: Use the readers UIMenuController which enables the highlighting etc. The default is true. If set to false it’s possible to modify the shared UIMenuController for yourself. Note: This doesn’t disable the text selection in the web view.

Classes/FolioReaderConfig.html#/s:14Foli.name: identifier
Classes/FolioReaderConfig.html#/s:14Foli.abstract: Used to distinguish between multiple or different reader instances. The content of the user defaults (font settings etc.) depends on this identifier. The default is nil.

Classes/FolioReaderConfig.html#/s:14Foli.name: localizedHighlightsDateFormat
Classes/FolioReaderConfig.html#/s:14Foli.abstract: Localizes Highlight date format. This is a dateFormat from NSDateFormatter, so be careful ðŸ¤”

Classes/FolioReaderCenter.html#/s:14Foli.name: delegate
Classes/FolioReaderCenter.html#/s:14Foli.abstract: This delegate receives the events from the current FolioReaderPages delegate.

Classes/FolioReaderCenter.html#/s:14Foli.name: pageDelegate
Classes/FolioReaderCenter.html#/s:14Foli.abstract: This delegate receives the events from current page

Classes/FolioReaderCenter.html#/s:14Foli.name: enableScrollBetweenChapters(scrollEnabled:)
Classes/FolioReaderCenter.html#/s:14Foli.abstract: Enable or disable the scrolling between chapters (FolioReaderPages). If this is enabled it’s only possible to read the current chapter. If another chapter should be displayed is has to be triggered programmatically with changePageWith.

Classes/FolioReaderCenter.html#/s:14Foli.name: getCurrentChapter()
Classes/FolioReaderCenter.html#/s:14Foli.abstract: Find and return the current chapter resource.

Classes/FolioReaderCenter.html#/s:14Foli.name: getCurrentChapterProgress()
Classes/FolioReaderCenter.html#/s:14Foli.abstract: Return the current chapter progress based on current chapter and total of chapters.

Classes/FolioReaderCenter.html#/s:14Foli.name: getCurrentChapterName()
Classes/FolioReaderCenter.html#/s:14Foli.abstract: Find and return the current chapter name.

Classes/FolioReaderCenter.html#/s:14Foli.name: changePageWith(page:animated:completion:)
Classes/FolioReaderCenter.html#/s:14Foli.abstract: Changes the current page of the reader.

Classes/FolioReader.html.name: FolioReader
Classes/FolioReader.html.abstract: Main Library class with some useful constants and methods

Classes/FolioReaderWebView.html.name: FolioReaderWebView
Classes/FolioReaderWebView.html.abstract: The custom WebView used in each page
